sentences.sentence: After months of hard work, our plans finally came to fruition.
sentences.translation: 经过几个月的艰苦工作，我们的计划终于完成了。

sentences.sentence: These plans take time to come to fruition.
sentences.translation: 这些计划需要时间才会有收效。

sentences.sentence: His extravagant ideas were never brought to fruition.
sentences.translation: 他不切实际的想法从来都没有实现过。
